body: Rather than taking on the forms of others, some fetchling are adept at destroying the memories of other creatures. Instead of gaining disguise self as a spell-like ability, such fetchlings can use memory lapse once per day as a spell-like ability. For this ability, a fetchling's caster level is equal to his total Hit Dice. This racial trait modifies the spell-like ability racial trait.
name: Subtle Manipulator
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Fetchlings/Alternate Racial Traits/Subtle Manipulator
